extendedInfo.description: Reaper KeeperA fun and informative lifetime calculator.  How many days do you have left...when will the Reaper come a knockâin?  Calculate your Life Expectancy with Reaper Keeper.  Then, go back into your stored data, and see how making positive changes to your fitness, education, diet and habits can extend your lifetime.  You will be surprised at how significant slight changes effect your outcome.  If youâre healthy, and want to see how something like diabetes or heart disease might effect your life, tell Reaper Keeper that you have it and view the results.  Doctors always tell us to lose weight, exercise, stop smoking...Reaper Keeper can show you how significant those changes might be.Since the subject of this app is your longevity, we Included a âBucket Listâ to help you make goals and really âLIVEâ the rest of your life!  Itâs fun and includes some humorous details.  Great app for sharing with friends and family and comparing HOW LONG EACH OF YOU WILL LIVE! Features:Reaping Andy delivers your final life expectancy.Ability to make future changes to your data as your life changes.Angel Andy maintains your Bucket List.

reviews.comment: This app is awesome! My new favorite time killer. It\'s really entertaining to change one little detail and see how it affects your results.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a cool app. See how changing minor personal data effects your life expectancy. Wow, it shows I need to lose more weight.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So cool! What a great idea! No other app like it. And it seems to be very accurate, but I\'ll let you know in 72 years!
